# rjd3sts


## Installation

To get the current released version:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rjdemetra/rjd3sts@v1.1.0")
```

To get the current development version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("rjdemetra/rjd3sts")
```
